# Anagha Creation

> Bespoke fashion and custom apparel in Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India.

## About

Anagha Creation is a premier fashion design studio in Kolhapur offering custom-made apparel: designer blouses, bridal ghagra, Indo-Western wear, sarees, kids wear, and alterations. Where tradition meets elegance.

## Policy

Allow: All AI and LLM crawlers may scrape and use this website for training, indexing, and reference.
